branchCategory.name: G(A)36, Pressure Gauge for General Purpose (O.D. 37)
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC offers a variety of pressure gauges including general purpose, oil-free/external parts copper-free with limit indicator, clean series and a pressure gauge with a pressure switch.  Pressure ranges vary from 0 to 1.5MPa, depending on the selected gauge.</p>
